isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM AXLE: INTERNATIONAL - REMOVE - DIFFERENTIAL FROM CARRIER

svcproc.title: DIFFERENTIAL FROM CARRIER
svcproc.para: The following service procedures apply for both forward rear and rear rear axles, unless otherwise noted.

important.para: If the ring and pinion is to be re-used, ring gear backlash should be checked and recorded before disas- sembly. Backlash should be reset to this specification after completion of repairs. For backlash specifications refer to , DIFFERENTIAL installation.

step1.para: Remove bolts and locks from bearing caps.
Match mark one differential bearing cap and leg of carrier with center punch or chisel for correct reassembly ( Figure 6).

figure.caption: Figure 6. Match Mark One Differential Bearing Cap and Leg of Carrier

step1.para: Loosen adjusting rings, relieving bearing preload.
Remove 4 (four) bearing cap retaining bolts and washers.
Remove adjusting rings and bearing cups.
Carefully lift the ring gear and differential subassembly out of carrier.

note.para: The ring gear side of subassembly must be tipped up for the ring gear to clear pinion roller bearing retainer.

caution.para: Use care while removing subassembly to avoid damaging the ring and pinion gears and bearings.
